Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[usp_GetECEntities] Script Date: 07/03/2012 13:06:16 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_GetECEntities]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetECEntities] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL ='CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetECEntities] @PoolId bigint, @PoolCutPurpose nvarchar(200) = ''''Pool Cut'''' AS Begin
Declare @PoolType nvarchar(200) = '''''''' Declare @PoolHierarchyType nvarchar(200) = '''''''' Declare @PoolStatus nvarchar(200) = '''''''' Declare @PoolCount int Declare @ReadOnlyList table (CriteriaName nvarchar(100) not null) Declare @HideList table (CriteriaName nvarchar(100) not null)
Select @PoolType = PoolType , @PoolHierarchyType = PoolHierarchyType , @PoolStatus = Status From dbo.tblDimPool where DimPoolId = @PoolId
Select @PoolCount = Count(*) From dbo.tblDimPool Where ISNULL(PoolHierarchyType, '''''''') <> ''''Base''''
--Rule 1.0: Can not modify any Archived pool If @PoolStatus = ''''ARCHIVED'''' Begin
Insert Into @ReadOnlyList Select CriteriaName From dbo.tblDimEC Where DimPoolId = @PoolId Order BY CriteriaName End
--Rule 1.1: Only General Criterias of Base Pool which has no Children can be modified Else If ( @PoolCount >= 1 or @PoolCutPurpose in (''''PoolTargetParent'''', ''''PoolTargetChild'''') ) And @PoolStatus <> ''''ARCHIVED'''' Begin Insert Into @ReadOnlyList Select CriteriaName From dbo.tblDimEC Where DimPoolId = @PoolId And CriteriaTypeCode not in (''''IncludeExclude'''', ''''Targeting'''') And CriteriaName not in ( ''''EC601_Linked Loan Scenario 1_NewPoolByUnsoldLoanOnly_Reserve'''' , ''''EC604_TopUpByOnlyUnsoldLoans_Reserve'''' ) Order BY CriteriaName End
-- Rule 2: Hide all ''''IncludeExclude'''' and ''''Targeting'''' Criteria Insert Into @HideList Select CriteriaName From dbo.tblDimEC Where DimPoolId = @PoolId And CriteriaTypeCode in ( ''''IncludeExclude'''' , ''''Targeting'''' ) Order BY CriteriaName
-- Rule 3: For ''''PoolTargetParent'''', display ''''ECT1_Targeting_Parent'''' If ( @PoolType = ''''PoolTargetParent'''' And @PoolCutPurpose <> ''''PoolTargetChild'''') or @PoolCutPurpose = ''''PoolTargetParent'''' Begin Delete From @HideList Where CriteriaName = ''''ECT1_Targeting_Parent'''' End
-- Rule 4: For ''''PoolTargetChild'''', display ''''ECT2_Targeting_Size'''' If @PoolType = ''''PoolTargetChild'''' or @PoolCutPurpose = ''''PoolTargetChild'''' Begin Delete From @HideList Where CriteriaName = ''''ECT2_Targeting_Size'''' End
Select DimECID as CriteriaId , ECPassNoCode as ECPassNo , CriteriaDescription , EC.CriteriaName , CriteriaTypeCode , XMLSqlQueryEC , XMLSqlQueryDrillThrough , CriteriaTableTypeCode , Case When R.CriteriaName is null Then IsEditable Else Convert(bit,0) End As IsEditable , IsEnabled as IsEnable From dbo.tblDimEC EC Left Join @ReadOnlyList R on R.CriteriaName = EC.CriteriaName Where DimPoolId = @PoolId And EC.CriteriaName not in ( Select CriteriaName From @HideList ) Order by IsEditable Desc, Case When CriteriaTypeCode = ''''Targeting'''' Then 0 Else 1 End, CriteriaTypeCode, SequenceNo End ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
